Content.Text:
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Talking to you always gives me lots of
new ideas, Dunhill. You do love your
movies, don't you!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah. Cut that out, Hossan. I can't
match your wild imagination.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just now? I was just talking with
Dunhill about new book ideas.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your new book is going to be something
really special. I'm looking forward to
it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much. You'll be the first
one I show it to, Dunhill.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's that? It looks like we're having
fun? Of course we are! We both share the
same dream, after all.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hossan is gonna write the screenplay and
I'll direct. That's our shared dream to
make a movie!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've already shot quite a lot of
footage.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Although as we don't have any actors,
its more like a documentary.
<PAGE>
We want to make a real heartwarming
film set in this town, one day.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>, are you going to help us
out? You're so kind! Thank you!
<PAGE>
Do you think you could act in our film,
too?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a great idea!
<PAGE>
With all these young people moving into
the town, I reckon we could make a youth
drama or love story, even!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
This'll be great! I'm sure the camera
will love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah, we're just joking around.
Please don't let us scare you off.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you seriously want to get involved,
though, just let us know. We'll welcome
your participation.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Talking about all of this has really
got me excited again.
<PAGE>
Let's talk more about what kind of film
we should shoot!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Perfect! <MYNAME>, you want to help us
out as well?
